title: Facing Up to Aids: sex in the '90s
brief_description: This documentary gives an insight into sex in the 90’s as a diverse range of people relate their attitudes and experiences and indicate how issues such as AIDS and safe sex have had an impact on their lives.
title_for_label: Facing Up to Aids: sex in the ‘90s
